title: Autumn tale = Conte d'Automne
creator_credit: Eric Rohmer, Margaret Menegoz, Sofilmka, Rhone-Alpes Cinema, La Sept Cinema and Canal+
brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Tales of the four seasons = Contes des quatre saisons”.
The final instalment in Eric Rohmer’s “Tales of the four seasons” quartet of films looks at a later life romance. Friends and family of the widowed Magali decide that it is time she was matched up with a new lover. Beautifully filmed in the vineyards of the Rhone Valley. In French with English subtitles.
creator_credit_for_label: Eric Rohmer, Margaret Menegoz, Sofilmka, Rhone-Alpes Cinema, La Sept Cinema and Canal+
